summary: See you character enter in bed, sleep and get out of bed.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]This is a Alpha/Beta/WIP mod, it needs testing so I don\'t recommend to use it on your main saves[/color]

* Description
As this mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20054 seems dead and a little bugged I decided to make my own version of See You Sleep.
This mod permit to see you character enter in bed, sleep and get out of the bed.

* How this work:
 - Just activate a bed just like you will do normally, your character will walk and lie down on the bed.
 - Then press T (wait button) to sleep
 - And press E to make your character get out of the bed.

* Require:
 - Skyrim
 - SKSE

* Install:
Just copy the data folder in your Skyrim folder.

* uninstall
Go away from any beds and type in console:
stopquest dsyQuestSeeYouSleepUpdate
stopquest dsyQuestSeeYouSleep

* Changelog
Version WIP
 - initial release
Version WIP2
 - fix crafting and furniture

* Todo:
 - Sleep outfits
 - Make followers sleep

* Bugs/Issues
 - I don\'t use skyrim vanilla sleep system so anything that use this will not work. But as far as I know there is only one quest that need you to sleep. Or if someone knows how to force trigger the sleep event will you are lying on a bed.
 - I haven\'t tested it yet with vampire character and Heartfire/Dragonborn extension as I don\'t own these
 - Lost your character control
 - Maybe performance issues (run fine on my rig with ~30 others mods)
 - ...
author: Deziat
